text: Kathleen Ferrier (22 April 1912 â€“ 8 October 1953) was an English contralto singer. She got an international reputation for being a concert, stage and recording artist. Ferrier was born in Higher Walton, Lancashire. Ferrier was diagnosed with breast cancer in 1951. She died aged 41 at University College Hospital, London. == Other websites == * Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:Contraltos Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:English singers Category:Musicians from Lancashire Category:English opera singers Category:1912 births Category:1953 deaths
title: Kathleen Ferrier
